title: HKUST Hosts Coursera’s Second Annual Asia Regional Workshop (The Hong Kong University of Science and ...
text: ( Source : The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology ) The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology ( HKUST ) hosted Coursera's second annual Asia Regional Workshop in Hong Kong . Around 180 representatives from major Asian
